Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It's not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily experience. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects the value I place on the product and the confidence I have in its ability to exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
